name: vonage-web-js-master
description: This sample application demonstrates how to use the DeepAR SDK to add face filters and masks to your video call using the [Vonage Video(formerly OpenTok) Web SDK](https://tokbox.com/developer/sdks/js/), along with automating layout of video elements using [opentok-layout-js library](https://github.com/aullman/opentok-layout-js).
author: mega.siswanto@vonage.com
